rows.label: qev041309_MSG0001
rows.name:
Word on the street is that there's a middle-aged weirdo
somewhere in New LA who devotes his life to collecting
Miralife Cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0002
rows.name:
I think his name was... Oh, what was it? Wilbur?
Something like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hey, I'm looking for a simius. The card, I mean.
Miralife, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0004
rows.name:
And have you ever seen an ashizel? They're giant snail
things. Simius love 'em, apparently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0005
rows.name:
I kinda want to see one, so if you track one down,
I'll trade you my rare silver mortifole card for an
ashizel plus your simius card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0009
rows.name:
So this is an ashizel? Yeesh! Simius have some gross
taste in snacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0010
rows.name:
Or at least that's what the card claims. *ahem*
"Simius fuel their powerful bodies with a lipid-rich diet
of ashizel meat."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0011
rows.name:
Huh. You learn something new every day.
Anyway, thanks. Here's that silver mortifole card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041309_MSG0012
rows.name: Aw, that's a shame. Well, if you rethink it, I'll be here.[ST:wait ]
